Name: Base Station Renewal, Airport Car Service, Queens
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of the application of Airport Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one. The application of  Airport Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 178-36 Hillside Avenue in the borough of Queens, which application was approved by the taxi and limousine commission, is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#33
01/15/98
